title: Modern premium construction company marketing website (2026-style) with animations and conversion-focused sections

requirements.text: Build a single-page marketing website for a construction company with a bold, premium, professional 2026-trending layout using a clean grid system, large hero sections, full-width imagery, modern spacing, rounded corners, soft shadows, and subtle glassmorphism/gradient touches.

quotes: Create a modern, high-end construction company website with a 2026 trending web design layout.

acceptanceCriteria: The landing page renders all requested sections in the specified order and feels visually cohesive and premium.
The design uses a grid-based layout, large section spacing, rounded corners, and soft shadows consistently.
Color palette is primarily charcoal black + construction yellow + white.

requirements.text: Implement a sticky, transparent navbar that changes style on scroll (e.g., gains solid/blurred background, stronger shadow/border) and includes navigation links that smoothly scroll to each section (Hero, About, Services, Projects, Why Choose Us, Testimonials, Contact/CTA).

quotes: Add: Sticky transparent navbar that changes on scroll.

acceptanceCriteria: Navbar is fixed at the top and remains usable on all screen sizes.
On scroll, navbar transitions to a more readable style (background and contrast change) with smooth animation.
Clicking navbar links smoothly scrolls to the correct section.

requirements.text: Create the Hero section with a full-width cinematic construction-site background image, a strong headline exactly “Building the Future with Strength & Precision”, a short subtitle, two prominent CTA buttons labeled “Get a Quote” and “View Projects”, and subtle parallax and/or fade-in animation.

quotes: Hero Section: Full-width background image of a construction site (high quality, cinematic lighting). Strong headline like: “Building the Future with Strength & Precision” ... Two CTA buttons (Get a Quote, View Projects). Subtle parallax or fade-in animation.

acceptanceCriteria: Hero uses a full-width background image with an overlay/contrast treatment to keep text readable.
Headline text matches exactly: “Building the Future with Strength & Precision”.
Two CTA buttons are visible above the fold on desktop and remain accessible on mobile.
Hero content animates in (fade/slide) and the background has a subtle parallax/scroll effect without jank.

requirements.text: Implement the About Us section as a split layout (image on one side, text on the other) with a modern overlapping image effect and smooth reveal-on-scroll animation.

quotes: About Us Section: Split layout (image on one side, text on the other). Use a modern overlapping image effect. Smooth scroll animation.

acceptanceCriteria: On desktop, About shows a two-column split layout; on mobile it stacks logically with good spacing.
The image presentation includes an overlapping/offset layer effect (e.g., framed card, secondary accent block, or stacked images).
Section reveals with a smooth scroll-triggered animation.

requirements.text: Implement the Services section with 3–6 service cards in a responsive grid. Each card must include an icon, title, and short description, and have hover micro-interactions (lift + shadow) consistent with the premium style.

quotes: Services Section: 3–6 service cards with icons. Hover animations (lift effect + shadow). Use grid layout with equal spacing.

acceptanceCriteria: Services render 3–6 cards with consistent spacing and alignment across breakpoints.
Each service card includes an icon, a clear title, and a short description in English.
Hovering a card triggers a lift and shadow transition (and optional subtle border/gradient change) smoothly.

requirements.text: Implement Featured Projects as a masonry or modern grid gallery with full-bleed project images. On hover, show an overlay with project details, and on click open a lightbox (modal) to view the image larger and navigate between projects.

quotes: Featured Projects: Masonry or modern grid gallery layout. Hover overlay with project details. Lightbox effect on click.

acceptanceCriteria: Projects display in a modern grid or masonry-like layout with consistent gutters.
Hovering a project reveals an overlay containing at least a project name and a short detail line.
Clicking a project opens a modal/lightbox with the larger image; user can close it and navigate to next/previous project.
Lightbox is keyboard accessible (Escape closes; focus is trapped within modal).

requirements.text: Implement a Why Choose Us section with a clean icon-based layout and animated statistic counters (animated numbers) that begin counting when the section enters the viewport.

quotes: Why Choose Us: Statistics counters (animated numbers). Clean icon-based layout.

acceptanceCriteria: Section displays multiple reasons/features with icons and concise English copy.
At least 3 statistics counters animate from 0 to target values on first view.
Animation triggers on scroll into view and does not continuously re-trigger on minor scroll changes.

requirements.text: Implement Testimonials as a modern card carousel/slider with smooth transitions and responsive behavior (touch/swipe support on mobile).

quotes: Testimonials: Modern card carousel slider. Smooth transition animation.

acceptanceCriteria: Testimonials appear in a horizontally sliding carousel with smooth transitions.
Carousel includes controls (dots/arrows) and supports swipe on mobile.
Cards maintain premium styling (rounded corners, subtle shadows, readable typography).

requirements.text: Implement a conversion-focused Call to Action section with a dark background, bold typography, and a strong CTA button (English label) that visually stands out using the construction-yellow accent.

quotes: Call to Action Section: Dark background with bold typography. Strong CTA button.

acceptanceCriteria: CTA section has a clearly darker background than surrounding sections and strong typographic hierarchy.
CTA button is prominent and uses the accent color appropriately.
CTA section looks good on mobile and desktop with no cramped spacing.

requirements.text: Create a minimal but modern Footer including contact information, quick links, and social icons, styled to match the premium theme.

quotes: Footer: Minimal but modern. Contact info, quick links, social icons.

acceptanceCriteria: Footer includes: contact info, a list of quick links, and social icons.
Footer layout is responsive and maintains readability and spacing across breakpoints.
Footer styling matches site palette and typography.

requirements.text: Add site-wide smooth reveal animations on scroll for major sections/elements and micro-interactions on hover (buttons, links, cards) while maintaining performance and accessibility (respect reduced motion preference).

quotes: Smooth scroll animations. Micro-interactions on hover. Smooth reveal animations.

acceptanceCriteria: Major sections/components animate in as they enter the viewport (e.g., fade/slide) with consistent timing/easing.
Hover states exist for interactive elements (buttons, nav links, cards) with smooth transitions.
If the user prefers reduced motion, animations are reduced/disabled appropriately.

requirements.text: Ensure the entire site is fully responsive and mobile-optimized, with strong typography (large modern sans-serif), clear hierarchy, and modern UI/UX best practices (readability, contrast, spacing, accessible interactions).

quotes: Fully responsive layout (mobile optimized). Use modern UI/UX best practices.

acceptanceCriteria: All sections render correctly on common breakpoints (mobile/tablet/desktop) without overflow or layout breakage.
Typography uses a modern sans-serif with a premium feel and strong hierarchy (headlines, subheads, body).
Interactive elements meet basic accessibility expectations (focus states visible, sufficient contrast for text).

requirements.text: Add the required generated construction imagery as static assets under frontend/public/assets/generated and wire them into the Hero, About, and Projects sections as full-width/strategic visuals consistent with the premium layout.

quotes: Professional stock construction images placed strategically. Full-width background image of a construction site (high quality, cinematic lighting).

acceptanceCriteria: All generated images are present under frontend/public/assets/generated and are referenced directly by the frontend.
Hero uses the generated cinematic construction background image.
Featured Projects uses the generated project images, and About uses the generated about image.

constraints: Frontend files under frontend/src/components/ui and the Internet Identity/actor hooks listed as immutable must not be modified directly; compose them as-is if needed.
No third-party authentication providers beyond Internet Identity (not required for this marketing site).
Do not add external databases or non-Motoko backends; keep backend changes out unless explicitly needed.
nonGoals: Building an admin dashboard/CMS for editing site content.
Implementing a real contact form submission pipeline (email/SMS/third-party integrations).
Adding user accounts, login flows, or gated content.

Modern premium construction team on-site photo, clean composition (about-team.dim_1400x1000.png)

preferencesToAdd: Prefer bold, premium, professional web designs with strong typography, smooth animations, grid layouts, and charcoal/yellow/white palette for construction brand websites.
